medical_history.chief_complaint: Fluid at right hip and low grade fevers
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient presented from rehab with low grade fevers and right hip pain, reported ongoing low grade fevers since recent discharge. Symptoms have progressed with persistent pain at the right hip and suprapubic area, though initial pain was severe, managed with IV morphine. Imaging showed stable fluid collection around the right hip joint.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Dementia, history of DVT/PE with IVC filter, chronic anemia, thrombocytopenia with suspected MDS, newly diagnosed hypothyroidism, recurrent UTIs, right hip prosthetic joint infection status post multiple washouts.
